definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of form and appearance, of a woman ‖[[יׁ֑פִי]] Pr 31:30; [[אֵשֶׁת חֵן]] Pr 11:16; [[זונה טובת חן]] Na 3:4; of a doe Pr 5:19; precious stone [[אבן חן]] Pr 17:8; of ornaments Pr 1:9 = Pr 4:9, Pr 3:22.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of speech, lips Ps 45:3, Pr 22:11; words Ec 10:12.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: with God Zec 4:7, Zec 4:7, Zec 12:10; chiefly in phrases: [[מחא חן בעיני]] find favour in the eyes of: (I) men Ge 30:27, Ge 32:6, Ge 33:8, Ge 33:10, Ge 33:15, Ge 34:11, Ge 39:4, Ge 47:25, Ge 47:29, Ge 50:4, Nu 32:5 (all J); De 24:1, Ru 2:2, Ru 2:10, Ru 2:13, 1Sa 1:18, 1Sa 16:22, 1Sa 20:3, 1Sa 20:29, 1Sa 25:8, 1Sa 27:5, 2Sa 14:22, 2Sa 16:4, 1Ki 11:19, Es 5:8, Es 7:3; (2) of God Ge 6:8, Ge 18:3, Ge 19:19, Ex 33:12, Ex 33:13, Ex 33:13, Ex 33:16, Ex 33:17, Ex 34:9, Nu 11:11, Nu 11:15 (all J); Ju Jdg 6:17, 2Sa 15:25, Pr 3:4; abs. [[מחא חן]] (with man) Pr 28:23; (with God) Je 31:2; [[מׂחא חן לפניו]] Es 8:5 (i.e. of the king); [[נתן חן בעיני]] give favour in the eyes of (I) man Ge 39:21, Ex 3:21, Ex 11:3, Ex 12:36 (J); abs. [[נתן חן]] of man Ps 84:12; (2) of God Pr 3:34; [[נשׂא חֵן בְּעֵינֵי]] obtain favour in the eyes of  Es 2:15; of the king Es 5:2; so [[וַתִּשָּׂא־חֵן וׇחֶסֶד לְפָנׇיו]] Es 2:17.
